title: S12 Ep151: Beyond The Bermuda Triangle
itunes:title: Beyond The Bermuda Triangle
description:
When Bruce Gernon took off from South Florida and headed for Bimini, it was supposed to be an ordinary flight, but it ended up being anything but that! Bruce ended up flying into what he thought at first might have been the Bermuda Triangle, but ended up revealing things to him that he had never seen before, including a time vortex!!

Bruce Gernon: http://www.electronicfog.com/

https://www.amazon.com/Beyond-Bermuda-Triangle-Encounters-Electronic/dp/1632651017/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1503375725&sr=8-1&keywords=beyond+the+bermuda+triangle
